data.comment: The match has started at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Throw-in Lens.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Bordeaux in Lens.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Benoit Millot awards Lens a goal kick.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Otavio for Bordeaux drives towards goal at Stade Bollaert-Delelis. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Lens.
The second-half is underway at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 46, Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Ignatius Kpene Ganago.
Bordeaux have a goal kick.
In the minute 51, In Lens a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Bordeaux are coming forward and Nicolas De Preville gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lens.
In the minute 53, Bordeaux will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Lens.
Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Lens.
At Stade Bollaert-Delelis, Jonathan Gradit has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 54, Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lens have been awarded a penalty...
He's off! Paul Baysse is shown a red card.
In the minute 59, Gael Kakuta smashes in a penalty at Stade Bollaert-Delelis. The score is now 2-0.
Pablo Castro is replacing Jimmy Briand for Bordeaux at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Free kick Lens.
In the minute 62, Benoit Millot signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Lens's half.
Throw-in for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Lens make their first substitution with Seko Fofana replacing Cheick Oumar Doucoure.
In the minute 64, Benoit Millot awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Lens in the half of Bordeaux.
Benoit Millot blows against Lens's Gael Kakuta for offside.
In the minute 66, Benoit Millot signals a free kick to Lens.
Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lens to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
